platformInfo.description: GameHive is your premier platform for selecting, playing, and mastering board and strategy games with friends or online opponents.

homePage.description: Start your journey by selecting a game to play.
features: Browse all available games.
Identify free games and games requiring purchase.
Quick access to your favorite games.

gameLibrary.description: Explore the full catalog of games.
features: View detailed game information including rules and achievements.
Purchase games securely with supported payment options.
Search and filter games by category or popularity.

profilePage.description: Manage your account and personal settings.
features: Edit your bio and upload a profile picture.
Update login credentials like email and password.
View your game achievements and progress.
Mark games or friends as favorites for quick access.

friendSystem.description: Connect with other players on the platform.
features: Search for users by username and send friend requests.
View a list of your friends and their profiles.
Track your stats against each friend, including wins and losses.

scoreboards.description: Compare your performance with other players.
features: View detailed stats for each game you play.
Track your global and friend-only rankings.
Set goals to climb the leaderboards.
View detailed data for each match, including opponents and outcomes.
Filter matches by date, game, or result.
Analyze past matches to improve your strategy.
Invite friends from your friend list to a private match.
Match with a random online opponent.
Start playing once another player joins.

gameAchievements.description: Unlock achievements to show your mastery.
features: Achievements are specific to each game.
See unlocked and locked achievements.
Track progress and learn how to unlock remaining achievements.
Mark games as favorites for faster selection.
Mark friends as favorites to prioritize interactions.
Access your favorite games and friends from your profile page.

gamePlay.description: Enjoy seamless matches with friends or online opponents.
features: Play free games or purchased ones.
Engage in private matches or public matchmaking.
Experience high-quality gameplay with detailed match data.

quickTips.gettingStarted: Start from the home page to select and play a game.
quickTips.editingProfile: Go to your profile page to customize your bio, picture, and login details.
quickTips.addingFriends: Use the friend system to search for users and send friend requests.
quickTips.unlockingAchievements: Check the achievements page of each game to track progress and unlocking criteria.
quickTips.purchasingGames: Look for games marked as 'premium' in the game library and follow the purchase process.
